parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.70

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes all items from [[handgunWeapon]], except magazine.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[removeAllHandgunItems]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addHandgunItem]], [[removeHandgunItem]], [[removeAllPrimaryWeaponItems]], [[removeAllSecondaryWeaponItems]], [[removeAllBinocularItems]]
